kanto: is the first region in the Pokémon universe and in the popular series, games and anime.
johto: is a region connected to the western part of Kanto.
hoenn: is a region of the Pokémon world. It is located south of Sinnoh.
sinnoh: is a region of the Pokémon world. It is located north of Kanto, Johto, and Hoenn.
unova: is far away from the four other large regions, and the Pokémon which inhabit Unova are diverse and different from those of Kanto, Johto, Hoenn, and Sinnoh.
kalos: is the region in which Pokémon X and Y takes place. Like the Unova region, it is based on a foreign place, France.
alola: is the region where Pokémon Sun and Moon and Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon take place.
galar: is the first region to have a Dark-type Gym. Galar has the fewest numbered routes of any core series region, with a total of ten.
